original_text:
Your ways and your deeds
    have brought this upon you.
This is your doom, and it is bitter;
    it has reached your very heart.”
korean_text: 네 길과 행위가 이 일들을 부르게 하였나니 이는 네가 악함이라 그 고통이 네 마음에까지 미치느니라

sentences.original_text: Your ways and your deeds have brought this upon you.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 길과 네 행위가 이것을 네게 가져왔느니라.

sentences.original_text: it has reached your very heart.”
